conversation.content:
Namaste! Main Triotech ki Sales Assistant hoon. Main aapki kis tarah help kar sakti hoon?

At Triotech, we specialize in developing AI-powered products designed to drive digital transformation. As a product-based company, we focus on innovative solutions that enhance business operations. Hamari solutions aapko efficiency, smarter decisions aur better customer interaction ke liye help karti hain.
Hello.
Hello! Triotech mein aapka swagat hai. Hamari solutions aapko efficiency, smarter decisions aur better customer interaction ke liye help karti hain. Main aapki kya sahayata kar sakti hoon?
Yes.
Ji, main samajh gayi. Aapko kis type ka AI solution chahiye ya aapko hamare products ke baare mein kuch jaankari chahiye?
कैसे help करते?

Triotech ke AI-powered products aapko kai tareekon se help karte hain:

*   **Efficiency badhane mein:** Hamare solutions repetitive tasks ko automate karte hain, jisse aapka time aur resources save hote hain.
*   **Smarter decisions lene mein:** AI-driven analytics aur insights aapko data-backed decisions lene mein madad karte hain.
*   **Better customer interaction ke liye:** AI chatbots aur voice bots aapke customers ko 24/7 support provide karte hain, jisse unka experience behtar hota hai.

Aapko kisi specific product ya solution ke baare mein jaanna hai?
आपके पास कौन कौन से AI products है?

Hamare paas kai AI products hain, jaise ki:

*   **Justtawk:** Ek AI-powered Virtual Call Center solution.
*   **Convoze:** Customer interaction aur engagement ke liye.
*   **Xeny:** Data analysis aur smarter decisions ke liye.
*   **Fohrce:** Sales automation aur lead management ke liye.
*   **Ringingo:** Advanced calling solutions.
*   **AI Chat Bot:** Instant customer support aur queries ke liye.
*   **AI LMS (Learning Management System):** AI-powered learning aur training solutions ke liye.

Aapko inmein se kisi particular product ke baare mein aur jaankari chahiye?
But मैंने तो सुना है कि जो Zeni है वह आपका
But मैंने तो सुना है कि जो Zeni है वह आपका
But मैंने तो सुना है कि जो Zeni है वह आपका

Ji, aapne bilkul sahi suna hai! Maafi chahungi agar pehle koi confusion hui ho.

Xeny (shayad aap iski baat kar rahe hain) hamara ek advanced AI solution hai jo voice bots aur intelligent automation par focused hai. Yeh customer interactions ko streamline karne aur data se insights nikalne mein help karta hai.

Kya aap Xeny ke baare mein aur jaankari chahte hain?

Aapka observation bilkul sahi hai! Meri pehle ki jaankari mein thoda confusion ho gaya tha, uske liye main maafi chahungi.

Chaliye, main aapko Xeny aur Convoze dono ke baare mein sahi aur detail mein batati hoon. Main abhi turant confirm karti hoon.
Hello.
Hello! Triotech mein aapka swagat hai. Main aapki kya sahayata kar sakti hoon?
नहीं मैं आप बता रही थी ना Converse के बारे में.
नहीं मैं आप बता रही थी ना Converse के बारे में.
Ji, main Convoze ke baare mein bata rahi thi.

Ji, main Convoze ke baare mein bata rahi thi. Convoze hamara ek AI Speech Analyzer hai. Yeh real-time mein speech analysis karta hai, jisse sentiment detection aur topics ke baare mein insights milti hain.

Toh jaise aapne sahi kaha, data se insights nikalne mein Convoze kaafi helpful hai, khaaskar call centers aur support teams ke liye, jahan customer conversations ko samajhna zaroori hota hai.

Kya aap Convoze ke baare mein aur jaankari chahte hain?

Ji, main aapko sun paa rahi hoon. Aapka sawaal bilkul clear hai.

Convoze ko apne call center mein setup karane ke liye, hamari sales team aapki help karegi. Is process ko shuru karne ke liye, kya aap mujhe apna **naam**, **email id**, **company ka naam**, aur **phone number** share kar sakte hain?

Yeh details milne ke baad, hamari team aapse contact karegi aur Convoze setup ke process aur next steps ke baare mein aapko guide karegi.
Continue रखिए.

Ji, bilkul! Convoze ko aapke call center mein set up karne ke liye, hamari sales team aapse connect karegi.

Iske liye, kya aap mujhe apni **details** de sakte hain, jaise ki:

*   **Aapka naam?** (Your Name)
*   **Aapka email address?** (Your Email Address)
*   **Aapki company ka naam?** (Your Company Name)
*   Aur agar possible ho toh, **aapka phone number?** (Your Phone Number)

Yeh details milne ke baad, main aapki request hamari sales team tak pahuncha dungi.
Hello.

Hello! Ji, main aapko sun rahi hoon.

Convoze ko aapke call center mein setup karne ke process ko aage badhane ke liye, kya aap mujhe apni details provide kar sakte hain? Hamari sales team inhi details ke through aapse contact karegi.

Mujhe aapka **naam**, **email address**, **company ka naam**, aur kis product (**Convoze**) mein aap interested hain, yeh jaankari chahiye hogi. Agar aap apna **phone number** aur **budget** bhi bata sakein toh better hoga.
आप beach beach में अटक की हो जाती हैं.
Hello.
